title: Licensed to drive (Captioned)
brief_description: Jeff regains his licence after losing it for drink-driving. He is determined to keep it this time and has to find ways of sticking to the zero limit. Eventually he is able to meet the challenge of going to a party and enjoying himself without alcohol. He can keep to his decision : “When I drink I don’t drive and when I drive I just don’t drink”.
